name: No Crates This Time
description:
Fill the game area with holes and end on a target

There are 10 levels. The goal of each level is to cover the hole game area with holes, while ending on a target. You can't move back over holes, so be careful!

Please feel free to leave a comment! This is a part of a personal challenge to make a simple puzzle game every day for a week, with at least 10 levels. I'm using puzzlescript for each game. This is game seven - the last of this challenge of mine!

It was fun, and I plan on making more, playing around with puzzle game design - maybe even making a full-fledged one, after I get some more practice under my belt!
